sentences.sentence: Results; Reserpine, an inhibitor of VMAT, itself had no poisonous effect on PC12 cells.
sentences.translation: 结果：单独加入VMAT抑制剂利血平对PC12细胞无毒性作用；

sentences.sentence: Methods The reserpine reversal test and 5-htp induced head-twitches test were used in mice.
sentences.translation: 方法采用小鼠利血平拮抗实验和5 -羟色胺酸(5 - HTP)诱导的甩头实验。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To investigate the effect of reserpine and verapamil on Neisseria gonorrhoeae′s multiple antibiotic resistance.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究维拉帕米、利舍平在淋球菌多重耐药性中的作用。
